text: Libnan ( or , ) is a song by Lydia Canaan. Canaan, who in 1997 was awarded the Lebanese International Success Award by the Lebanese Ministry of Tourism,Lydia Canaan Receiving Lebanese International Success Award wrote and recorded the song in 1993 as a loving tribute to her country, Lebanon. In 2004, the song became the soundtrack of the advertisement "Rediscover Lebanon", produced and broadcast by CNN to over one-billion viewers and commissioned by the Lebanese Ministry of Economy & Trade to promote Lebanon as a tourist destination. El Zein, Tarek. "Year-Long Advertising Campaign Promotes Lebanon as a Global Tourist Destination", The Daily Star, Beirut, April 16, 2004. Retrieved May 1, 2017.MEA Co-Sponsors a CNN Ad Campaign, Airliners.net. title: Libnan (Lydia Canaan song)
